markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Nimble Hooves](/Feats.aspx?ID=1382) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tiefling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=258" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 40 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your legs end in hooves rather than feet, with joints and tendons that allow you to move with great haste. Your Speed increases by 5 feet.

**Special** The Speed increase from this feat isn't cumulative with any Speed increase from your ancestry feats (such as [Nimble Elf](/Feats.aspx?ID=16)).
name: Nimble Hooves
